factionKeywords: legiones daemonicalegiones daemonicalegiones daemonicalegiones daemonicalegiones daemonica
lore: Blessed with apotheosis from mortal to daemonic form, a Daemon Prince is a monstrous entity well used to commanding cruel legions in battle. Their supernatural gifts are many and varied, from sorcerous powers to diseased fortitude, warp-forged weaponry, unholy swiftness or burning inner furnaces of unquenchable rage.

faction: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch: If this model has the TZEENTCH keyword
add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s infernal cannon.

otherAbilities.Daemon Prince of Nurgle:: If this model has the NURGLE keyword, add 1 to this model’s Toughness characteristic.
